info.title: Information Hub Service
info.description: Information Hub Service exposes HTTP API for exporting and importing information.

example.version: Ut eos magnam in itaque quia.

example.status: Qui reiciendis doloremque magni dicta rerum.

get.description: Export returns data signed as Verifiable Presentation.

parameters.name: exportName
parameters.description: Name of export to be performed.

schema.description: Name of export to be performed.

post.description: Import the given data wrapped as Verifiable Presentation into the Cache.

requestBody.description: Data wrapped in Verifiable Presentation that will be imported into Cache.

schema.description: Data wrapped in Verifiable Presentation that will be imported into Cache.

exportName.description: Name of export to be performed.

data.description: Data wrapped in Verifiable Presentation that will be imported into Cache.

importIds.description: importIds is an array of unique identifiers used as Cache keys to retrieve the imported data entries later.

tags.name: infohub
tags.description: Information Hub Service enables exporting and importing information.

tags.name: health
tags.description: Health service provides health check endpoints.
